name: Ground Mosh
description:
Shoot'em up game with platforms! Control your steampunk tank and fight against a cyberpunk boss.

  • Don't fall! Jump between platforms
  • Proximity damage. The closer you are to the enemy the harder you hit
  • 2 weapons + jump/dash extra mobility
  • Easy and hard mode
  • Gamepad supported

Created with Rosalila Shooter Engine
